drug.name: MBT-0312
drug.description: MediGene's newly acquired drug candidates MBT-0312 aim at a novel method of cancer therapy by "starving out" tumors.
drug.indication: Investigated for use/treatment in solid tumors.
drug.mechanism-of-action: The already approved and accepted therapy of anti-angiogenesis (suppressing tumor vascularization), is complemented by MBT-0312. An innovative proprietary carrier system of lipid complexes facilitates a novel application method of established cytostatic drugs (e.g. Taxane), intended to cause specific attachment and destruction of tumor blood vessels ("neovascular targeting").
